thread.title: Wendy Mewis
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Wendy Mewis

author: Wendy Mewis
title: Wendy Mewis
text: I purchased a Barbour coat for my daughter as a Christmas present, which was the wrong one when she opened it. We had lost the Return Form so I emailed them asking them to send one through. They replied on Christmas Day with the appropriate forms - I reordered the correct coat on Boxing Day and received it the next day! Brilliant service!
